data.title: Gillian Welch and David Rawlings
data.text:
Gillian Welch and David Rawlings are coming to the Thomas Wolfe Auditorium at Harrah’s Cherokee Center – Asheville on October 19. Enter below for your chance to win a pair of tickets from 98.1 The River!

Tickets & Info: Gillian Welch & David Rawlings | Asheville, NC

ENTER TO WIN

CONTEST RULES

Starting at 12:01 on 8/5/24 and ending at 11:59pm on 8/11/24 entrants can complete an entry form at 981TheRiver.com to register to win (2) tickets to see Gillian Welch and David Rawlings at Thomas Wolfe Auditorium on October 19, 2024. Total estimated retail value of Prize is $100.

There will be five winners randomly selected from the pool of all eligible entries on Monday, August 12, 2024. Winners will be notified via email by 5pm the same day.

Prize is claimed via electronic transfer. Tickets will be electronically transferred to email account under which contest participant registered for contest no later than one week before the date of the concert. Ticket Transfer will be ordered via TicketMaster and Ticketmaster will email winner notification that you have a ticket transfer waiting for acceptance. Winner must create a Ticketmaster account or log in to existing account associated with this email to accept ticket transfer and access your tickets.

One entry per person per day for duration of contest.

Submitting more than one entry per person per duration of contest will invalidate all entries by that contestant. Any entries submitted on behalf of another individual or using another person’s email address or name will be disqualified and ineligible to claim any prize. Any attempt by any participant to obtain more than the stated number of entries allowed by using same, multiple/different email addresses, identities, or any other methods void that participant’s entries and that participant may be disqualified. In the event of a dispute as to any on-line registration, the authorized account holder of the e-mail address used to register will be deemed to be the registrant and he/she must be eligible according to these Official Rules. No mechanically reproduced or automated entries permitted. Use of any automated system to participate is prohibited and will result in disqualification and all such entries will be deemed void.

98.1 The River contests are open to all eligible participants who are legal residents of the United States as determined by the Company, aged 18 or older, and who have not won anything on 98.1 The River in the past 30 days or any prize valued at $600 or more in the past 6 months. Only one winner per household is permitted within 30 days after a household has a winner. Any prize awarded to an ineligible listener will be deemed null and void, and an alternate eligible winner may be named.

No purchase necessary. Asheville Radio Group’s sole responsibility will be to award the prize. Asheville Radio Group will have no further responsibility in connection with the prize if the prize winner, for any reason, cannot or decides not to use any of the prizes. Winners will be responsible for all federal and state taxes, and any fees and incidentals. Prizes are not transferable or redeemable for cash.
